exercises.title: 1 Fill  the gaps / Попълнете празните места

lines: Fill the blanks using comparative form / Попълнете празните места, като използвате сравнителна степен
My cat is friendlier than yours.
This exam is _____________ (easy) than the last one.
This exam is easier than the last one.
She is _____________ (happy) now than she was before.
She is happier now than she was before.
This song is _____________ (popular) in our country than that one.
This song is more popular in our country than that one.
His new car is _____________ (fast) than the old one.
His new car is faster than the old one.
This street is quieter than ours.
Mary is busier today than yesterday.
This problem is _____________ (serious) than we thought.
This problem is more serious than we thought.
2 Fill  the gaps / Попълнете празните места
Fill the blanks using superlative form / Попълнете празните места, като използвате превъзходна степен
This painting is _____________ (beautiful) than the other one.
This painting is more beautiful than the other one.
He is the _____________ (strong) man I have ever met.
He is the strongest man I have ever met.
This is the _____________ (interesting) book I have read.
This is the most interesting book I have read.
She is the _____________ (beautiful) girl in the class.
She is the most beautiful girl in the class.
This is the _____________ (long) movie I have ever watched.
This is the longest movie I have ever watched.
That is the _____________ (difficult) exam we had this semester.
That is the most difficult exam we have this semester.
This is the _____________ (quiet) place I know.
This is the quietest place I know.
He is the _____________ (intelligent) student in the university.
He is the most intelligent student in the university.
This is the _____________ (important) decision of my life.
This is the most important decision of my life.
That is the _____________ (expensive) dress in the store.
That is the most expensive dress in the store.
This is the _____________ (tasty) dessert I have ever eaten.
This is the tastiest dessert I have ever eaten.
3 Translation from Bulgarian into English {speak the set of words or short opened questions or reorder the words)
Translate the sеntences from Bulgarian into English / Преведете изреченията от български на английски.
Той е по-висок от брат си.
He is taller than his brother.
Моят стол е по-удобен от твоя.
My chair is more comfortable than yours.
Тази книга е по-интересна от онази.
This book is more interesting than that one.
Моята къща е по-голяма от тяхната.
My house is bigger than theirs.
Днешното време е по-топло от вчерашното.
Today's weather is warmer than yesterday's.
Колата му е по-скъпа от моята.
His car is more expensive than mine.
Моят смартфон е по-нов от твоя.
My smartphone is newer than yours.
Тя е по-умна от останалите деца в клас.
She is smarter than the other kids in the class.
Работата му е по-трудна от моята.
His job is harder than mine.
Този път е по-опасен от онзи.
This road is more dangerous than that one.
4 Translation from Bulgarian into English {speak the set of words or short opened questions or reorder the words)
Translate the sеntences from Bulgarian into English / Преведете изреченията от български на английски.
Той е най-високото момче в класа.
He is the tallest boy in the class.
Това е най-удобният стол в стаята.
This is the most comfortable chair in the room.
Тази книга е най-интересната, която съм чел.
This is the most interesting book I have ever read.
Това е най-голямата къща в квартала.
This is the biggest house in the neighbourhood.
Днешното време е най-топло за този месец.
Today's weather is the warmest of the month.
Това е най-скъпата кола, която съм виждал.
This is the most expensive car I have ever seen.
Това е най-новият смартфон на пазара.
This is the newest smartphone on the market.
Тя е най-умното дете в училището.
She is the smartest child in the school.
Това е най-трудната работа, която съм имал.
This is the hardest job I have ever had.
Този път е най-опасният в района.
This road is the most dangerous in the area.
5 Translation from Bulgarian into English {speak the set of words or short opened questions or reorder the words)
Translate the sеntences from Bulgarian into English / Преведете изреченията от български на английски.
Той е толкова висок, колкото брат си.
He is as tall as his brother.
Моята кола е толкова бърза, колкото твоята.
My car is as fast as yours.
Това упражнение е толкова лесно, колкото предишното.
This exercise is as easy as the previous one.
Нейната къща е толкова голяма, колкото нашата.
Her house is as big as ours.
Този филм е толкова интересен, колкото книгата.
This movie is as interesting as the book.
Тя е толкова умна, колкото брат си.
She is as smart as her brother.
Това масло е толкова вкусно, колкото и останалите.
This butter is as tasty as the others.
Работата й е толкова трудна, колкото и моята.
Her job is as hard as mine.
Този ресторант е толкова скъп, колкото онзи отсреща.
This restaurant is as expensive as the one across the street.
Моят компютър е толкова бърз, колкото и твоя.
My computer is as fast as yours.
Тя не е толкова висока, колкото сестра си.
She is not as tall as her sister.
Това не е толкова скъпо, колкото си мислех.
This is not as expensive as I thought.
Този тест не е толкова труден, колкото предишния.
This test is not as difficult as the previous one.
Моето куче не е толкова агресивно, колкото неговото.
My dog is not as friendly as his.
Тази книга не е толкова интересна, колкото предишната.
This book is not as interesting as the previous one.
Твоето обяснение не беше толкова ясно, колкото очаквах.
Your explanation was not as clear as I expected.
Услугата тук не е толкова добра, колкото в другите ресторанти.
The service here is not as good as in other restaurants.
Градът не е толкова голям, колкото очаквах.
The city is not as big as I expected.
Проблемът не е толкова сериозен, колкото мислехме.
The problem is not as serious as we thought.
Урокът не е толкова скучен, колкото миналия път.
The lesson is not as boring as last time.
6 The new words / Новите думи: (flush cards in combination with speak the words if possible)
Learn the new words / Научете новите думи

feedback.wrong: Not quite. Use the target form for this task. Try repeating the full correct sentence out loud.

exercises.title: 1 Translation from Bulgarian into English {speak the set of words or short opened questions or reorder the words)

lines: Translate the sеntences from Bulgarian into English / Преведете изреченията от български на английски
Аз ще отида на кино утре.I will go to the cinema tomorrow.
Ти ще учиш английски следващата седмица.You will study English next week.
Той ще си купи нова кола.He will buy a new car.
Тя ще готви вечеря довечера.She will cook dinner tonight.
Ние ще посетим баба ни.We will visit our grandmother.
Вие ще отидете на плажа през лятото.You will go to the beach in the summer.
Те ще заминат за Лондон в петък.They will travel to London on Friday.
Аз ще работя в офиса следващия месец.I will work in the office next month.
Ти ще пишеш писмо до приятеля си.You will write a letter to your friend.
Той ще прочете новата книга.He will read the new book.
Преведете следните изречения на английски с отрицателна форма на бъдеще просто време.
Аз няма да отида на работа утре.I will not go to work tomorrow.
Ти няма да гледаш телевизия тази вечер.You will not watch TV tonight.
Той няма да яде пица за вечеря.He will not eat pizza for dinner.
Тя няма да учи английски днес.She will not study English today.
Ние няма да играем футбол утре.We will not play football tomorrow.
Вие няма да пътувате следващата седмица.You will not travel next week.
Те няма да останат в хотел.They will not stay in a hotel.
Аз няма да купя нов телефон.I will not buy a new phone.
Ти няма да посетиш този музей.You will not visit this museum.
Той няма да хвърли старите си обувки.He will not throw away his old shoes.
2 Translation from Bulgarian into English {speak the set of words or short opened questions or reorder the words)
Translate the sеntences from Bulgarian into English / Преведете изреченията от български на английски
Ще отидеш ли на парти утре?Will you go to the party tomorrow?
Той ще напише ли това писмо?Will he write this letter?
Тя ще бъде ли в офиса следващата седмица?Will she be in the office next week?
Ние ще пътуваме ли до Париж през лятото?Will we travel to Paris in the summer?
Те ще готвят ли днес?Will they cook today?
Ще намерите ли нова работа?Will you find a new job?
Аз ще завърша ли проекта си утре?Will I finish my project tomorrow?
Той ще свири ли на пиано тази вечер?Will he play the piano tonight?
Ние ще гледаме ли този филм?Will we watch this movie?
Ще прочетеш ли статията?Will you read the article?
Translation from Bulgarian into English {speak the set of words or short opened questions or reorder the words)
Translate the sеntences from Bulgarian into English / Преведете изреченията от български на английски
Обещавам, че няма да бъда закъснял.I promise I won't be late.
Сигурен съм, че тя ще успее да си намери работа.I am sure she will find a job.
Обещавам, че ще ти помогна с домашното.I promise I will help you with your homework.
Мисля, че ще бъде слънчев ден утре.I think it will be a sunny day tomorrow.
Убеден съм, че той ще постигне успех.I am convinced he will succeed.
Обещавам, че няма да забравя за срещата ни.I promise I won't forget our meeting.
Предполагам, че те ще се върнат скоро.I suppose they will return soon.
Сигурен съм, че ще харесаш този филм.I am sure you will like this movie.
Обещавам, че ще направя всичко възможно.I promise I will do my best.
Мисля, че няма да вали утре.I think it won't rain tomorrow.
The new words / Новите думи: (flush cards in combination with speak the words if possible)
Learn the new words / Научете новите думи
shopping list /ˈʃɒpɪŋ lɪst/ – списък за пазаруване

feedback.wrong: Almost there. Listen once more and repeat clearly.

exercises.title: 1 Translation from Bulgarian into English {speak the set of words or short opened questions or reorder the words)

lines: Translate the sеntences from Bulgarian into English / Преведете изреченията от български на английски.
Аз бях уморен вчера.I was tired yesterday.
Ти беше на работа миналата седмица.You were at work last week.
Той беше в Лондон миналата година.He was in London last year.
Тя беше на село през лятото.She was in the village this summer.
То беше много студено миналата зима.It was very cold last winter.
Ние бяхме вкъщи миналата вечер.We were at home last night.
Вие бяхте на концерт миналия петък.You were at the concert last Friday.
Те бяха щастливи след изпита.They were happy after the exam.
Аз бях болен вчера.I was sick yesterday.
Ти беше на плажа миналата седмица.You were at the beach last week.
2 Translation from Bulgarian into English {speak the set of words or short opened questions or reorder the words)
Translate the sеntences from Bulgarian into English / Преведете изреченията от български на английски.
Беше ли той у дома вчера?Was he at home yesterday?
Бяхте ли на работа миналата седмица?Were you at work last week?
Беше ли тя в училище вчера?Was she at school yesterday?
Бяхме ли на почивка миналата година?Were we on vacation last year?
Бяха ли те в музея в неделя?Were they at the museum on Sunday?
Бяхте ли на срещата вчера?Were you at the meeting yesterday?
Беше ли слънчево миналата седмица?Was it sunny last week?
Бях ли прав за решението?Was I right about the decision?
Бяха ли децата в парка вчера?Were the children at the park yesterday?
Беше ли той добър ученик?Was he a good student?
3 Translation from Bulgarian into English {speak the set of words or short opened questions or reorder the words)
Translate the sеntences from Bulgarian into English / Преведете изреченията от български на английски.
Аз не бях на училище вчера.I was not (wasn't) at school yesterday.
Ти не беше вкъщи миналата вечер.You were not (weren't) at home last night.
Той не беше на работа през уикенда.He was not (wasn't) at work over the weekend.
Тя не беше в киното миналата седмица.She was not (wasn't) at the cinema last week.
То не беше студено миналата зима.It was not (wasn't) cold last winter.
Ние не бяхме в парка вчера.We were not (weren't) at the park yesterday.
Вие не бяхте щастливи след новините.You were not (weren't) happy after the news.
Те не бяха на срещата.They were not (weren't) at the meeting.
Аз не бях болен вчера.I was not (wasn't) sick yesterday.
Ти не беше на партито миналата събота.You were not (weren't) at the party last Saturday.
4 Translation from Bulgarian into English {speak the set of words or short opened questions or reorder the words)
Translate the sеntences from Bulgarian into English / Преведете изреченията от български на английски.
Аз гледах филма вчера.I watched the movie yesterday.
Ти отвори вратата бързо.You opened the door quickly.
Той затвори прозореца.He closed the window.
Тя готви вечерята вчера.She cooked dinner yesterday.
То падна от стола.It fell off the chair.
Ние написахме писмото.We wrote the letter.
Вие измихте колата.You washed the car.
Те играха футбол в парка.They played football in the park.
Аз прочетох книгата миналата седмица.I read the book last week.
Ти посети музея вчера.You visited the museum yesterday.
5 Translation from Bulgarian into English {speak the set of words or short opened questions or reorder the words)
Translate the sеntences from Bulgarian into English / Преведете изреченията от български на английски.
Гледа ли филма вчера?Did you watch the movie yesterday?
Отвори ли той вратата бързо?Did he open the door quickly?
Затвори ли тя прозореца?Did she close the window?
Готви ли тя вечерята вчера?Did she cook dinner yesterday?
Падна ли то от стола?Did it fall off the chair?
Написахме ли писмото навреме?Did we write the letter on time?
Измихте ли колата?Did you wash the car?
Те играха ли футбол в парка?Did they play football in the park?
Прочетох ли книгата миналата седмица?Did I read the book last week?
Посети ли музея вчера?Did you visit the museum yesterday?
6 The new words / Новите думи: (flush cards in combination with speak the words if possible)

Learn the new words / Научете новите думи

exercises.title: 1 Fill the gaps / Популнете празните места

lines: Choose the right personal pronoun / Изберете правилното лично местоимение.
The chair is next to ___. (he / him)
The cat is next to ___. (she / her)
Fill the gaps / Популнете празните места
Choose the right possessive pronoun / Изберете правилното притежателно местоимение.
Fill the gaps / Популнете празните места
Choose the right possessive pronoun / Изберете правилното притежателно местоимение.
4 Fill  the gaps / Популнете празните места
Choose the right pronoun / Изберете правилното лично местоимение.
The cat is with ___ owner. (it's / its)
5 Word order {speak the set of words or short opened questions or reorder the words)
Put the words in order to form right sentences / Подредете думите, за да съставите правилни изречения.
6 Put the right pronouns / Поставете правилното местоимение ( fill the gaps or speak the set of words-the whole sentence)
Put the right pronoun which co-responds to the subject / Поставете притежателното местоимение, което отговаря на подлога.
The boy is in his bedroom.
The girl is in her bedroom.
I am sitting in my car.
The man is doing his job.
The policewoman is doing her job.
Mr. Brown is reading his newspaper.
We are playing in our yard.
The boys are playing their game.
The man is cleaning his car.
The Browns are cleaning their van.
Are you sleeping in your bedroom?
The woman is cleaning her cooker.
The cooker is standing in its corner.
The dog is drinking its milk.
The girl is showing her new books to her friends.
I am talking to my friends.
Mr. Morgan is talking to his driver.
Mrs. Morgan is going to her dentist.
The children are reading their lesson.
7 The new words / Новите думи: (flush cards in combination with speak the words if possible)
Learn the new words / Научете новите думи

feedback.wrong: Not quite. Use the target form for this task. Try repeating the full correct sentence out loud.

exercises.title: Fill the gaps / попълнете празните места

lines: Fill the missing words with the right WH-question words / Попълнете липсващите думи в изреченията с подходящите въпросителни думи (What, When, Where, Who, Which, Why, How many, How much).
______ is your name?Answer: What is your name?
______ is your birthday?Answer: When is your birthday?
______ are you from?Answer: Where are you from?
______ is your teacher?Answer: Who is your teacher?
______ is your favorite color?Answer: What is your favorite color?
______ time is it?Answer: What time is it?
______ are you going to the park?Answer: When are you going to the park?
______ book is yours?Answer: Which book is yours?
______ do you like reading?Answer: Why do you like reading?
______ people are coming to the party?Answer: How many people are coming to the party?
______ is the weather like today?Answer: What is the weather like today?
______ much is the ticket?Answer: How much is the ticket?
______ many books are on the shelf?Answer: How many books are on the shelf?
______ is the nearest bus stop?Answer: Where is the nearest bus stop?
______ do you get to school?Answer: How do you get to school?
______ is your house?Answer: Where is your house?
______ does your brother work?Answer: Where does your brother work?
______ much is the rent for this apartment?Answer: How much is the rent for this apartment?
______ is your best friend?Answer: Who is your best friend?
______ does your sister go to school?Answer: Where does your sister go to school?
2 Words order {speak the set of words or short opened questions or reorder the words) / Подредете думите
Use the words to form questions / Използвайте дадените думи, за да съставите въпроси.
your / book / where / is?Answer: Where is your book?
how / are / old / you?Answer: How old are you?
your / what / name / is?Answer: What is your name?
pen / which / is / yours?Answer: Which pen is yours?
why / crying / are / you?Answer: Why are you crying?
when / you / going / are / to / the / cinema?Answer: When are you going to the cinema?
is / your / favorite / what / food?Answer: What is your favorite food?
you / where / live / do?Answer: Where do you live?
many / how / brothers / do / you / have?Answer: How many brothers do you have?
sister / where / does / your / work?Answer: Where does your sister work?
your / how / sister / is?Answer: How is your sister?
the / what / time / is?Answer: What time is it?
who / your / is / teacher?Answer: Who is your teacher?
how / do / to / school / you / go?Answer: How do you go to school?
this / whose / is / bag?Answer: Whose bag is this?
who / the / is / your / best / friend?Answer: Who is your best friend?
how / you / do / cook?Answer: How do you cook?
when / is / birthday / your?Answer: When is your birthday?
which / is / your / seat?Answer: Which is your seat?
where / do / your / parents / live?Answer: Where do your parents live?
Translation from Bulgarian into English {speak the set of words or short opened questions or reorder the words)
Translate the sеntences from Bulgarian into English / Преведете изреченията от български на английски.
Какво е това?Answer: What is this?
Къде е твоят дом?Answer: Where is your house?
Кога ще отидеш на работа?Answer: When are you going to work?
Колко книги имаш?Answer: How many books do you have?
Защо не учиш?Answer: Why aren’t you studying?
Коя химикалка е твоята?Answer: Which pen is yours?
Кой е този мъж?Answer: Who is this man?
Как се казваш?Answer: What is your name?
Кога е партито?Answer: When is the party?
Къде е магазинът?Answer: Where is the shop?
Колко струва билетът?Answer: How much is the ticket?
Как е баща ти?Answer: How is your father?
Коя е любимата ти книга?Answer: What is your favorite book?
Къде са твоите приятели?Answer: Where are your friends?
Как се казва сестра ти?Answer: What is your sister’s name?
Защо си закъснял?Answer: Why are you late?
Къде живееш?Answer: Where do you live?
Колко е часът?Answer: What time is it?
Как стигаш до училище?Answer: How do you get to school?
Кой е директорът?Answer: Who is the principal?
Какво обичаш да ядеш?Answer: What do you like to eat?
Колко братя имаш?Answer: How many brothers do you have?
Къде е моята раница?Answer: Where is my backpack?
Как е времето днес?Answer: What is the weather like today?
Как се чувстваш?Answer: How do you feel?
Колко струва захарта?Answer: How much is the sugar?
Къде е учителят?Answer: Where is the teacher?
Защо тя е тъжна?Answer: Why is she sad?
Какво учиш?Answer: What are you studying?
Колко хора са в класната стая?Answer: How many people are in the classroom?

Отрицание: The blackboard isn't on the wall.

Отрицание: The rubber isn't in the box.

Отрицание: The lamp isn't on the table.

Отрицание: The firemen aren't in the yard.

Отрицание: The pencils aren't in the box.

Отрицание: The notebooks aren't on the desk.
The desk is in the classroom.

Отрицание: The desk isn't in the classroom.
The teacher is in the classroom.
Въпрос: Is the teacher in the classroom?
Отрицание: The teacher isn't in the classroom.

Translate the sntences from Bulgarian into English / Преведете изреченията от български на английски.

Where is the cat? It is in the classroom.
Къде е кутията? Тя е на масата.
Where is the box? It is on the table.
Къде е моливът? Той е на чина.
Where is the pencil? It is on the desk.
Къде е тетрадката? Тя е в кутията.
Where is the notebook? It is in the box.
Къде е лампата? Тя е на бюрото.
Where is the lamp? It is on the desk.
Къде е гумичката? Тя е в ръката на момичето.
Where is the rubber? It is in the girl's hand.
Къде е линийката? Тя е на чина.
Where is the ruler? It is on the desk.
Къде е учебникът? Той е на бюрото.
Where is the textbook? It is on the desk.
Къде са децата? Те са в двора.
Where are the children? They are in the yard.
Къде са огнеборците? Те са в двора.

Къде е жената? Тя е в магазина.

exercises.title: 1 Fill the gaps / Попълнете празните места

lines: Fill the gaps with the right preposition / Попълнете празните места с правилния предлог (at, on, in).
They always have a meeting ____ Monday.Answer: on
I go to bed ____ 10 o'clock.Answer: at
We play tennis ____ the morning.Answer: in
My birthday is ____ July.Answer: in
He goes to work ____ the weekend.Answer: at
I have breakfast ____ the morning.Answer: in
We have a meeting ____ 3 o’clock.Answer: at
They go swimming ____ summer.Answer: in
The movie starts ____ 7 P.M.Answer: at
My sister was born ____ December.Answer: in
2 Make questions / Направете въпроси (speak the set of words or short opened questions or reorder the words)
Turn the following sentences in questions / Превърнете следните изречения във въпроси.
They have lunch at 12 o’clock. (What time ____?)Answer: What time do they have lunch?
She studies English in the evening. (When ____?)Answer: When does she study English?
He visits his grandparents on Sundays. (Who ____?)Answer: Who does he visit on Sundays?
I do my homework in the afternoon. (What ____?)Answer: What do you do in the afternoon?
We go to the gym at 6 A.M. (Where ____?)Answer: Where do we go to the gym?
She plays tennis in the park. (Where ____?)Answer: Where does she play tennis?
They leave the house at 8 A.M. (What time ____?)Answer: What time do they leave the house?
He reads books every evening. (When ____?)Answer: When does he read books?
I meet my friends on Friday. (Who ____?)Answer: Who do you meet on Friday?
They travel to Spain in summer. (Where ____?)Answer: Where do they travel in summer?
Put the words in order to form right sentences / Подредете думите, за да съставите правилни изречения go / work / you / do / to / time / what?
Answer: What time do you go to work?
the / on / we / beach / go / weekends.Answer: We go to the beach on weekends.
sister / morning / my / the / in / to / park / goes.Answer: My sister goes to the park in the morning.
Christmas / we / have / at / a / tree.Answer: We have a tree at Christmas.
gym / she / to / the / goes / on / Sundays.Answer: She goes to the gym on Sundays.
he / every / evening / plays / football.Answer: He plays football every evening.
book / I / new / the / bought / yesterday.Answer: I bought the new book yesterday.
we / shopping / go / at / night.Answer: We go shopping at night.
she / in / office / the / works / every / day.Answer: She works in the office every day.
they / visit / often / family / their.Answer: They often visit their family.
4 Translation from Bulgarian into English {speak the set of words or short opened questions or reorder the words)
Translate the sеntences from Bulgarian into English / Преведете изреченията от български на английски.
Работиш ли? Да.Answer: Do you work? Yes, I do.
Какво работиш? Аз съм учител.Answer: What do you work as? I am a teacher.
Къде работиш? Работя в училище.Answer: Where do you work? I work in a school.
Как работиш? Работя много усърдно.Answer: How do you work? I work very hard.
Кога работиш? Работя в понеделник, вторник и четвъртък.Answer: When do you work? I work on Monday, Tuesday, and Thursday.
Той работи ли? Да.Answer: Does he work? Yes, he does.
Какво работи той? Той е счетоводител.Answer: What does he work as? He is an accountant.
Къде работи той? Той работи в министерство.Answer: Where does he work? He works in a ministry.
Как работи той? Той работи много.Answer: How does he work? He works a lot.
Кога работи той? Той работи всеки ден.Answer: When does he work? He works every day.
Закусваш ли? Да.Answer: Do you have breakfast? Yes, I do.
Къде закусваш? Закусвам у дома.Answer: Where do you have breakfast? I have breakfast at home.
В колко часа закусваш? Закусвам в 8 часа.Answer: What time do you have breakfast? I have breakfast at 8 o'clock.
Той обядва ли? Да.Answer: Does he have lunch? Yes, he does.
Къде обядва той? Той обядва в офиса.Answer: Where does he have lunch? He has lunch in the office.
В колко часа обядва той? Той обядва в 1 часа.Answer: What time does he have lunch? He has lunch at 1 o'clock.
Ти готвиш ли? Да.Answer: Do you cook? Yes, I do.
Какво готвиш? Готвя вечеря много често.Answer: What do you cook? I cook dinner very often.
Кога готвиш? Готвя в неделя.Answer: When do you cook? I cook on Sundays.
Как готвиш? Мисля, че готвя много добре.Answer: How do you cook? I think I cook very well.
Къде готвиш? Готвя в кухнята.Answer: Where do you cook? I cook in the kitchen.
Тя чисти ли офиса? Да.Answer: Does she clean the office? Yes, she does.
Кога чисти офиса? Тя чисти сутрин.Answer: When does she clean the office? She cleans in the morning.
Как чисти офиса? Мисля, че тя чисти офиса много добре.Answer: How does she clean the office? I think she cleans the office very well.
Колко често чисти офиса? Тя чисти офиса всеки ден.Answer: How often does she clean the office? She cleans the office every day.
Къде живееш? Аз живея в Русе.Answer: Where do you live? I live in Ruse.
Как живееш? Аз живея много добре.Answer: How do you live? I live very well.
Той къде живее? Той живее в Перник.Answer: Where does he live? He lives in Pernik.
Как живее той? Той не иска много.Answer: How does he live? He doesn't want much.
Четеш ли книги? Да.Answer: Do you read books? Yes, I do.
Колко често четеш? Чета всяка вечер.Answer: How often do you read? I read every evening.
Кога четеш? Чета вечер.Answer: When do you read? I read in the evening.
Как четеш? Аз чета много бързо.Answer: How do you read? I read very fast.
Той кара ли кола? Да.Answer: Does he drive a car? Yes, he does.
Кога кара той? Той кара сутрин и вечер.Answer: When does he drive? He drives in the morning and evening.
Как кара той? Мисля, че кара много бързо.Answer: How does he drive? I think he drives very fast.
Къде кара? Той кара в града.Answer: Where does he drive? He drives in the city.
Играете ли? Да.Answer: Do you play? Yes, we do.
Какво играете? Играем нови игри.Answer: What do you play? We play new games.
Кога играете? Играем вечер.Answer: When do you play? We play in the evening.
Как играете? Мисля, че играем много добре.Answer: How do you play? I think we play very well.
Къде играете? Играем на двора.Answer: Where do you play? We play in the yard.
Идваш ли тук? Да.Answer: Do you come here? Yes, I do.
Кога идваш тук? Идвам тук през май и юни.Answer: When do you come here? I come here in May and June.
Как идваш тук? Идвам тук с автобус.Answer: How do you come here? I come here by bus.
Колко често идваш тук? Идвам тук три пъти месечно.Answer: How often do you come here? I come here three times a month.
Той пише ли? Да.Answer: Does he write? Yes, he does.
Какво пише? Той пише доклади.Answer: What does he write? He writes reports.
Как пише? Мисля, че пише много добре.Answer: How does he write? I think he writes very well.
Къде пише? Пише в офиса.Answer: Where does he write? He writes in the office.
5 The new words / Новите думи: (flush cards in combination with speak the words if possible)
Learn the new words / Научете новите думи
